com.madrobot.di.xml.io

Class XppReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.di.xml.io.AbstractReader
      • com.madrobot.di.xml.io.AbstractPullReader
        • com.madrobot.di.xml.io.XppReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorReporter, ExtendedHierarchicalStreamReader, HierarchicalStreamReader

    public class XppReader
extends AbstractPullReader
    XStream reader that pulls directly from the stream using the XmlPullParser API.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XppReader(Reader reader)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 1.4, use XppReader(Reader, XmlPullParser) instead

      Deprecated. 
      As of 1.4, use XppReader(Reader, XmlPullParser, NameCoder) instead
      XppReader(Reader reader, XmlPullParser parser)
      Construct an XppReader.
      XppReader(Reader reader, XmlPullParser parser, NameCoder nameCoder)
      Construct an XppReader.
